mapper.select: select exam_paper_allocation_id from exam_paper_allocation inner join exam_paper_release on exam_paper_allocation.exam_paper_release_id = exam_paper_release.exam_paper_release_id where student_id=#{studentId} and exam_paper_allocation_state=2 order by exam_start_time desc limit 1
select count(student_id) from exam_paper_allocation where student_id=#{studentId} and exam_paper_allocation_state=2
mapper.update: update exam_paper_allocation join exam_paper_release on exam_paper_allocation.exam_paper_release_id = exam_paper_release.exam_paper_release_id set exam_paper_allocation_state=1 where #{nowTimes} >= exam_start_time and #{nowTimes} <= exam_end_time and exam_paper_allocation_state=0

update exam_paper_allocation join exam_paper_release on exam_paper_allocation.exam_paper_release_id = exam_paper_release.exam_paper_release_id set exam_paper_allocation_state=3 where #{nowTimes} >= exam_end_time and exam_paper_allocation_state!=2
mapper.select: select * from exam_paper_allocation where exam_paper_allocation_id=#{examPaperAllocationId} and exam_paper_allocation_state=1

select * from exam_paper_allocation inner join exam_paper_release on exam_paper_release.exam_paper_release_id = exam_paper_allocation.exam_paper_release_id where student_id=#{studentId} and exam_paper_allocation_state in (2,3) order by exam_start_time desc
select * from exam_paper_allocation where exam_paper_allocation_id=#{examPaperAllocationId} and exam_paper_allocation_state in (2,3)
